text: You kinda need to go to the bathroom.
You ask if you can go to the bathroom.
The teacher looks suspicious but allows it.
You feel a shit coming on
You're about to take a shit when you notice an ominous figure.
'You don't wanna give in to Big Shit, do you?'
The figure finished off with a few words:
'When Big Shit Shits... Shit Gets Big...'
